publications.title: In-Situ Melt Pool Characterization via Thermal Imaging for Defect Detection in Directed Energy Deposition Using Vision Transformers
publications.authors: Israt Zarin Era, Fan Zhou, Ahmed Shoyeb Raihan, Imtiaz Ahmed, Alan Abul-Haj, James Craig, Srinjoy Das, Zhichao Liu
publications.bodyText:
- Proposed a Vision Transformer framework integrating self-supervised MAE and supervised classification for melt pool anomaly detection in DED-printed parts.
- Achieved an accuracy of up to 99.17% for defect identification.

publications.title: An Unsupervised Approach Towards Promptable Porosity Segmentation In Laser Powder Bed Fusion By Segment Anything
publications.authors: Israt Zarin Era, Imtiaz Ahmed, Srinjoy Das, Zhichao Liu
publications.bodyText:
- Proposed an unsupervised SAM + clustering pipeline for XCT-based porosity segmentation.
- Achieved over 80% Dice Similarity Coefficient without supervised labeling or fine-tuning.

publications.title: Prediction of Mechanical Behaviors of L-DED Fabricated SS 316L Parts via Machine Learning
publications.authors: Israt Zarin Era, Manikanta Grandhi, Zhichao Liu
publications.bodyText:
- Modeled SS316L tensile properties using XGBoost and Random Forest to reduce experimental burden.
- XGBoost achieved lower RMSE and higher RÂ² values, outperforming RF for yield strength, UTS, and elongation.

publications.title: Effect of Process Parameters on Tensile Properties of SS 316 Prepared by Directional Energy Deposition
publications.bodyText: - Investigated the effect of DED process parameters on tensile properties using XGBoost feature importance (F-score).
